metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32546 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability was found in ImageMagick, causing an outside the range ofrepresentable values of type 'unsigned long' at coders/pcl.c, when craftedor untrusted input is processed. This leads to a negative impact toapplication availability or other problems related to undefined behavior.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-32546` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagick++-6.q16-8 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-8 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickcore-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickcore-6.q16-6-extra - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6-extra - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickwand-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
perlmagick - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1').
